The above is a deed of joint immovable property registered jointly by the two parties.
Nature of the deed:- We both are members of a Hindu undivided family. After the death of our 1st wife, Kannathalli garu and our joint family head (late) Thanniru Venkati, our family inherited the property recorded under the record H.NO: 2-109 in Annapureddypalli Mandal, Ootupalli Grama Panchayat, and with the consent of all of us, for our convenience, it has been registered in the name of the 2nd of us in the records of the Grama Panchayat and the house tax etc. are being paid in his name. Our joint family hard earned family money of Rs. 2,00,000/- (Two lakh rupees) is stored. We are enjoying these immovable and movable properties which have been declared as joint family property jointly till today. This immovable property, which has been in common experience of all of us until today, has been divided into two shares, namely Schedules A and B, mentioned in this document, in the presence of the elders, and in the said shares, namely, the share of cash shown in Schedule A is the share of Mrs. Thanniru Venkamma, No. 1, and the share of property shown in Schedule B is the share of Mr. Thanniru Nagaraju, No. 2, and the fixed property that has come to whose share, each person shall be entitled to separate possession of the same on this very day. From today, each of us can enjoy the property that has come to our share, separately, to our sons, grandsons, descendants This is a deed of testamentary disposition of our joint family property, which we both have jointly signed. There is no other heir to our joint family property except us and there is no other immovable property to be shared by us.
1)
LTI of. T. Venkammna
2) Nagaraju

No.2) Scheduled Persons:- Sri. Thanniru Nagaraju S/O (Late) Thanniru Venkati, Age: 35 years, Occupation: Agriculture & Business, R/o Residence: House No.: 2-12/1, Rangapuram Village, Ootupalli Grama Panchayat, Annapureddypalli Mandal, Bhadradri Kothagudem District, Telangana State, (Aadhaar No: Xxxxxxxx 0571)(D.O.B. 01-01-1990)(Cell No:
9391310771) The 1st of us is the 2nd, and their mother is the mother. (Late) Thanniru Venkati, after his death, the 2nd of us is Sri. In the name of Thanniru Nagaraju, I have a house with a roof of Minjumile, Assessment No: 248, House No: 2-109, attached to the revenue boundary of Annapureddypalli Mandal, Bhadradri Kothagudem District, Minjumile, Assessment No: 248, House No: 2-109, RCC and ACC, with a total area of 197.31 Square Yards / 164.97 Square Meters, RCC ROOFED HOUSE PLINTH AREA: 395.10 Sq Fts, AC SHEETS ROOFED HOUSE PLINTH AREA: 174.09 Sq Fts, AC SHEETS ROOFED L/B PLINTH AREA: 36.75 Sq Fts, adbodo, having inherited this property, the property inherited by us is inherited by us as the 2nd of us. In their name, this day, the deed of sale has been registered in the name of Sri. Thanniru Nagaraju. I, Srimati. Thanniru Venkamma, do not have any other heirs, therefore, I hereby declare that the site of the said house is not an assigned ceiling / inam / prohibited land. If any objections come to light in the future, I hereby declare that I alone will be responsible for all such. We declare that this property is our hereditary property and that we are ready to pay as directed by the audit party for any kind of lot stamp formed in the future. 1) Our legal heirs are the ones in the document, this is true. 2) This deed of sale is the only one against which any objections arise. We can cancel.
3) This has nothing to do with the staff of the register office or the document writer.
4) If we have to pay anything more, we have no objection to pay.

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: VOOTUPALLI/VOOTUPALLI W-B: 0-0   HOUSE: 2/109     EXTENT: 197.31SQ.Yds  BUILT: 605.94SQ. FT  H NO 2-109 Boundaries:  [N]: SITE OF SALLABHAI  [S] HOUSE OF GUNJA RAMULU  [E]: HOUSE OF VEMULA KRISHNA  [W]: GP ROAD

sections.content: The property acquired by Tanniru Nagaraju, by virtue of Partition Deed No. 7492 of 2025, dated 19-Dec-2025, being Schedule-B, measuring an extent of 197.31 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-109, Assessment No. 248, situated in Vootupalli Village and Gramapanchayat, Annapureddypalli Mandal, within the District of Bhadradri Kothagudem, registered at sub-registrar office Kothagudem is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant Site of Sallabhai South by: House of Gunja Ramulu East by: House of Vemula Krishna West by: Gramapanchayat Road Note It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e.,Schedule-B property of the Partition Deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.
